welcome_message:
This app will help you track the days until your payday.

 Choose a day of the month and start counting!

title: Even small progress counts. Keep going! 🏆
Don't give up, your next paycheck is on its way! ✨
A small step today can make a big difference tomorrow. 🌱
Take a break ☕
You're on the right track! 🚀
Don't stop now 💪
Hey, you're enough. Always. ✨
Remember to save something for the future! 💰
Have you already planned how to use your next paycheck? 📝
notifications.body: Find out how many days are left until your payday!
